title: Preparation
text: Establish an incident response plan and team.

title: Detection
text: Monitor systems to detect incidents promptly.

title: Awareness
text: Provide training to recognize potential insider threats.

title: Monitoring
text: Implement monitoring to detect anomalous insider activity.

title: Software Integrity
text: Verify the integrity of software components.

title: Configuration Baselines
text: Maintain secure configuration baselines for all systems.

title: Patch Management
text: Apply patches in a timely manner to reduce vulnerabilities.
